articles.title: Prince Andrew's New Bid for the Limelight Recreates War Hero 'Propaganda'
articles.description: The Duke of York said he came back from the 1982 Falklands War, between Britain and Argentina, a "changed man" in a more than 700-word online comment.
articles.content:
Prince Andrew is trying to recreate his "great war hero" image of the Falklands War with a recent Instagram posting, as the royal's gradual exclusion from public life continues following the settlement of the Virginia Giuffre sexual abuse case.

articles.title: Aleix Espargaro Makes History, Hands Aprilia Their First MotoGP Pole
articles.description: Aleix Espargaro shone as Aprilia Racing celebrated their first MotoGP pole position in a dramatic pair of qualifying sessions in Argentina
articles.content: A stunning Saturday afternoon Q2 lap from Aleix Espargaro handed Aprilia Racing their first MotoGP pole position - and the Spaniard’s first pole position since the 2015 Catalan GP. It’s a magnificent day for the Noale factory at the Gran Premio Miche... [5090 chars]

articles.title: Aleix Espargaro and Aprilia claim maiden MotoGP win in Argentina
articles.description: Aleix Espargaro claimed his maiden MotoGP win at the Argentine Grand Prix on Sunday to move to the top of the championship after an intense ride which also gave Aprilia their first ever victory in the MotoGP era.
